sourcesContent:
<template>
 <v-dialog
          ref="dialog"
          v-model="modal"
          :return-value.sync="date"
          persistent
          width="290px"
        >
          <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-text-field
              v-model="date"
              label="Picker in dialogㅎㅎㅎㅎ"
              prepend-icon="mdi-calendar"
              readonly
              v-bind="attrs"
              v-on="on"
            ></v-text-field>
          </template>
          <v-date-picker
            v-model="date"
            scrollable
          >
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn
              text
              color="primary"
              @click="modal = false"
            >
              Cancel
            </v-btn>
            <v-btn
              text
              color="primary"
              @click="$refs.dialog.save(date)"
            >
              OK
            </v-btn>
          </v-date-picker>
        </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      menu: false,
      // date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10), menu: false
    }
  },
  methods: {
			getDay(date) {
				const daysOfWeek = ['일', '월', '화', '수', '목', '금', '토']
				let i = new Date(date).getDay(date);
				return daysOfWeek[i];
			},
			getMonth(date) {
				const monthName = ['1월', '2월', '3월', '4월', '5월', '6월', '7월', '8월', '9월', '10월', '11월', '12월'];
				let i = new Date(date).getMonth(date);
				return monthName[i];
			}
		},
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
